text: Riverdale Stars Join Jimmy Fallon For A Hilarious Peanuts Spoof By Mick Joest Random Article Blend In just two seasons, Riverdale has transformed from a bizarre Archie spin - off that some instantly wrote off to The CW's second most - watched show. The drama's success likely has more than just Netflix executives curious about what other seemingly innocent characters can be successfully rebooted with a dark twist, and The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon has already pushed another one out to the masses, complete with Riverdale's cast. Can Jimmy Fallon's Peanuts spoof be the next big thing in teen - oriented programming? Only one way to find out, blockheads. Whoever wrote up that sketch for The Tonight Show needs a raise ASAP, as that was ridiculously hi
